_: This is a sample JSON genesis file. Use 'sonictool genesis json example-genesis.json' to generate a database from it.

txs.name: InitializeAll (set validator1 to be SFC owner)
txs._legend: ^                   sealed epoch                               ^^            total supply                                      ^^                             sfc                              ^^                   node driver auth                           ^^                     node driver                              ^^                    evm writer                                ^^                        owner/admin                           ^

txs.name: SetGenesisValidator1
txs._legend: ^                               auth                           ^^                            validator id                      ^^                                                             ^^                           created time (not zero)             ^^                           pubkey length (42 hex = 66 dec)    ^^    pubkey bytes                                                                                                                  ^
